thought: To craft cyan_carpet, I need to place cyan_wool at slot 17 in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting table.
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 17 to slot 2 with quantity 1
